page.title: 04NOMANSLAND 1985
page.content: The main things Nomansland has are a little grocery shop called Riddets,the Chapel Reading Room and a pub.Riddets sells sweets,vegtables and freshly cooked bread six days a week.Tuesdays it sells Chelsea buns cooked in its little bakery at the back of the shop.Riddets sell a lot of things they cook them themselves such as on Wednesdays they sell currant buns and on Thursdays they sell Lardy cakes. They sell many things such as washing powder, food, lollies and frozen food. Next to this shop is the village pub. The pub has its own dart team, that travels around in the pub's mini bus. Its name is the Lamb Inn.It has a very large trade on Sundays and in the summer it has tables outside looking on to the village Green.The chapel is very old.It has an old school room round the back where rallies are held.
